Welcome to Pheonic!

Pheonic is a personal repository of whatever I happen to be interested in. These interests change over time, as will the contents of the site. However, the contents will be additive, increasing in number.

You are welcome to peruse the various posts and pages and perhaps you will find something of interest or inspiration.
